categories: Category:Members of the Brotherhood of Darkness

nodes.text: LaTor was a male fallen Jedi in service to Lord Kaan's and his Brotherhood of Darkness. When Kaan's number two, three, and four fell in battle, LaTor took their places, and would rally the troops for Kaan. LaTor was with Kaan for the creation of the thought bomb on Ruusan, and when Kyle Katarn experienced a dream of the past after he was knocked unconscious during later events on Ruusan, Katarn was impressed by his strength in the Force.
